title: MMA-studio
overview: MMA-studio is the program that delivers the latest on UFC and the sport Mixed Martial Arts. You can see excerpts from matches, fighter interviews and analyzes by the experts Anders Kvaal, Per Opsahl and guests. You'll get to know all that's worth knowing about what's called "the world's fastest growing sport"! The show goes into depth with the biggest names and delivers exclusive interviews with Norwegian and international celebrities. The program is not suitable for people under 18 years of age.
